name: Igor send me to get some tools and weapons
desc:
That was a lot of information to digest but You seem to be odly fine with that, like some part of You was already familiar with that story.
But there's no time for more thinking, Your life, wether it be digital or physical is on the line.
Go and find Henry and ask him for some tools.

dialog.answer: Y-Yes... I'm Henry, n-nice to meet You...

Um... The weapons?.answer:
Right, right! J-just give me a m-moment...
H-here is a pistol for the beginning, I-i don't have anything b-bigger until I get some m-materials...

Where have I heard that before... Is it.answer:
Y-yeah but You h-have to reload after 10 s-shots...
M-maybe You should g-go to M-m-madelyn now...
